amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce taxpayer exposure by removing Treasury guarantees for losses at the Export-Import Bank and to remove borrowing authority from the Treasury.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A077) Failed by recorded vote: 117 - 308 (Roll no. 611).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A077) Failed by recorded vote: 117 - 308 (Roll no. 611).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A077) offered by Mr. Mulvaney.
